summary: After flunking in medical school, the young and bohemian Vasco need to trick his aunts, the main financers of his studies, preventing them to know that he is not a doctor.
cast: Vasco Santana|Beatriz Costa|António Silva|Teresa Gomes|Sofía Santos|Alfredo Silva|Ana María|Manoel de Oliveira|Eduardo Fernandes|Silvestre Alegrim|Manuel Santos Carvalho|Henrique Alves|Artur Rodrigues|Júlia da Assunção|Maria Albertina|Francisco Costa|Jose Vitor|Sebastião Ribeiro|José Santos Alcibiado|Mariana Alves|Dina Teresa|Guimarães Brazão|Fernanda Campos|Zizi Cosme|Elvira Coutinho|Maria da Luz|Álvaro de Almeida|Coralia Escobar|Ivone Fernandes|Zeca Fernandes|Deolinda Gonçalves|Maria Leonor|Francisco Santos|Olga Vieira
keywords: singer|deception|aunt nephew relationship|medical student|city name in title
director: Director: José Cottinelli Telmo (as Cottinelli Telmo)
title: La Cancion de Lisboa
